description: OpenTOSCA Vintner is a TOSCA preprocessing and management layer which is able to deploy applications based on TOSCA orchestrator plugins. Preprocessing includes, e.g., the resolving of deployment variability.
summary: OpenTOSCA Vintner is a TOSCA preprocessing and management layer which is able to deploy applications based on TOSCA orchestrator plugins. Preprocessing includes, e.g., the resolving of deployment variability.
author: Miles Stötzner
